alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 4:15PM EDT until March 25 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 1 to 3 inches, sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Penobscot, Northern Washington and Southern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis
